Description:
Outdoor Salesman for LightingContribute to increasing company profits through fruitful customer relationships.
Present reports of potential prospects to the management for aiding critical business decisions.
Study company targets sales activities and strives for the continuous implementation of the same.
Manage typical conversion rate, sales calls, revenue, and other reports in a precise manner for accurate evaluation.
Boost company reputation by approaching existing and potential prospects in person and on a remote basis.
Collaborating with the design, development, and executive teams to understand a product or a service for subsequent promotional activities.Skills
Skills:
Have experience in Indoor & Outdoor Lighting & electricity products.
Holding Qatari driving license.
Strong understanding of Customer and market dynamics and requirements.
Proven leadership and ability to drive sales teams.
B.B.A. Degree in business administration or a related field.
Must have strong Business Communication and Leadership Skills.
